headline: ‘They Lied to Us’: Beirut Demonstrators Clash With Riot Police
abstract: Demonstrators and security forces battled in the worst violence yet after three months of protests against Lebanon’s political elite.
lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon — Riot police used water cannons, tear gas and rubber bullets to clear a large protest camp in the heart of the Lebanese capital on Saturday, sparking clashes with demonstrators that wounded scores of people and turned Beirut’s commercial center into a battle zone.
